item.title: Positive correlation between extent of fire incident, estimated loss and number of responding firefighters
item.description: Abstract This post analyzed the impact of extent of fire incidents on both economic loss and the number of firefighter responded. As well as correlation between loss and number of firefighters just for demonstration of the role of extent of fire between them. The goal is to identify the degree of correlation and the implication behind. Introduction "Fire Incidents Data" is a dataset published by the TFS, Toronto Fire Services, containing 17536 observations of fire incidents defined by the Ontario Fire Marshal.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
